name: Isitar 7
overview: Isitar 7 is a Lemmings-like game for MSX. Your object is to guide the 100 mice to the exit. You can assign the following skills to the mouse: climb a wall, use a parachute when falling, explode and destroy surrounding blocks, stop moving, make a ladder, dig sideways, dig diagonally down, dig down and return to the title screen.
